TITLE: Reindex Calendar Events for Search (PHP Command)
DESCRIPTION: Describes a command to reindex calendar event items for full-text search functionality, crucial after changes to search indexing configurations or data. Dependencies include the PHP CLI environment and the Oro search bundle.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oroinc/orocommerce-application/blob/master/UPGRADE.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: PHP
CODE:
```
php bin/console oro:search:reindex --class="Oro\Bundle\CalendarBundle\Entity\CalendarEvent"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Reindex Calendar Events with New Search Settings (PHP Command)
DESCRIPTION: Describes reindexing calendar events after search configuration changes to enable localized slug support, ensuring search accuracy and cache consistency. Run via PHP CLI with specified class parameter.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oroinc/orocommerce-application/blob/master/UPGRADE.md#_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: PHP
CODE:
```
php bin/console oro:search:reindex --class="Oro\Bundle\CalendarBundle\Entity\CalendarEvent"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Enabling Web API after Upgrade (Configuration Procedure)
DESCRIPTION: Instructs enabling the Web API feature through the provided documentation link, as the feature is disabled by default post-upgrade. Dependencies include access to API configuration settings.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oroinc/orocommerce-application/blob/master/UPGRADE.md#_snippet_4



----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating PHP Version for Compatibility (Upgrade Requirement)
DESCRIPTION: Recommends updating the PHP environment to specified minimum versions (e.g., 7.3.13, 8.0, 8.2) before running Composer install or update commands to prevent package conflicts and ensure platform compatibility.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oroinc/orocommerce-application/blob/master/UPGRADE.md#_snippet_5



----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Composer and Asset Plugin (Upgrade Instructions)
DESCRIPTION: Provides commands for updating Composer to version 1.4 and the Fxpio composer asset plugin to ensure compatibility after upgrading to version 1.1. Involves self-updating Composer and globally requiring the asset plugin.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oroinc/orocommerce-application/blob/master/UPGRADE.md#_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
composer self-update
composer global require "fxp/composer-asset-plugin"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adjusting Directory Structure for Files (Filesystem Changes)
DESCRIPTION: Details the migration of files from deprecated directories to new structured locations, which is essential after removal of old directories like 'var/attachment' and 'public/uploads'. A migration command helps automate this process.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oroinc/orocommerce-application/blob/master/UPGRADE.md#_snippet_7



----------------------------------------

TITLE: Handling Email Visibility Updates with MQ Topics (Configuration Note)
DESCRIPTION: Recommends adding specific message queue topics to the 'oro.index' queue to optimize email visibility updates during large-scale data modifications. Dependencies include MQ topic configuration and queue management.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oroinc/orocommerce-application/blob/master/UPGRADE.md#_snippet_1



----------------------------------------

TITLE: Rebuilding Price Lists After Upgrade (SQL and Console Commands)
DESCRIPTION: Provides SQL queries and a console command to fix scheduled price list issues following an upgrade, ensuring data consistency. Dependencies include database access and console execution within the PHP environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oroinc/orocommerce-application/blob/master/UPGRADE.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: SQL
CODE:
```
DELETE FROM oro_price_list_combined; DELETE FROM oro_price_product_combined;
```

LANGUAGE: PHP
CODE:
```
php bin/console oro:price-lists:schedule-recalculate --all
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Upgrading to Next Major Version (Upgrade Command)
DESCRIPTION: Guides the user to perform a full platform reindexation after upgrading from 1.0 to 1.1, using a specific console command with production environment flag to prepare the platform for continued operation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oroinc/orocommerce-application/blob/master/UPGRADE.md#_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
php bin/console oro:platform:update --env=prod --force
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Finding Changelog Files in Oro Packages
DESCRIPTION: This command is used to find all CHANGELOG.md files within the vendor/oro directory of an OroCommerce application. It searches up to a maximum depth of 2 directories, looking for files named CHANGELOG.md.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oroinc/orocommerce-application/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
find -L vendor/oro -maxdepth 2 -type f -name CHANGELOG.md
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Migrating Files from Deprecated Directories (Filesystem Changes)
DESCRIPTION: Guides migrating files from deprecated directories to new locations to comply with updated data storage structures, including the use of the 'oro:gaufrette:migrate-filestorages' console command. Dependencies include filesystem permissions and directory access.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oroinc/orocommerce-application/blob/master/UPGRADE.md#_snippet_3
